vernac_cmds: Definition change_site (E : Set) := change_x0 Site E eq_site_dec.
Lemma that_site : forall (E : Set) (f : Site -> E) (s0 : Site) (x : E), change_site E f s0 x s0 = x.
intros; unfold change_site in |- *; apply here.
Lemma other_site : forall (E : Set) (f : Site -> E) (s0 s1 : Site) (x : E), s0 <> s1 -> change_site E f s0 x s1 = f s1.
intros; unfold change_site in |- *; apply elsewhere; trivial.
Definition eq_queue_dec := eq_couple_dec Site Site eq_site_dec eq_site_dec.
Definition change_queue (Q : Set) := update2_table Site eq_site_dec Q.
Lemma that_queue : forall (E : Set) (f : Site -> Site -> E) (s0 s1 : Site) (x : E), change_queue E f s0 s1 x s0 s1 = x.
intros; unfold change_queue in |- *; unfold update2_table in |- *; apply here2.
Lemma other_queue : forall (E : Set) (f : Site -> Site -> E) (s0 s1 s2 s3 : Site) (x : E), s2 <> s0 \/ s3 <> s1 -> change_queue E f s0 s1 x s2 s3 = f s2 s3.
intros; unfold change_queue in |- *; unfold update2_table in |- *; apply elsewhere2; trivial.
Axiom finite_site : list_of_elements Site eq_site_dec LS.
Lemma in_s_LS : forall s : Site, In s LS.
intros; apply only_once_in with (eq_E_dec := eq_site_dec); exact (finite_site s).
Definition Bag_of_Data := Site -> Site -> queue Data.
Definition Post_message (m0 : Message) (b0 : Bag_of_message) (s0 s1 : Site) := change_queue (queue Message) b0 s0 s1 (input Message m0 (b0 s0 s1)).
Definition Collect_message (b0 : Bag_of_message) (s0 s1 : Site) := change_queue (queue Message) b0 s0 s1 (first_out Message (b0 s0 s1)).
Lemma post_here : forall (b0 : Bag_of_message) (m0 : Message) (s0 s1 : Site), Post_message m0 b0 s0 s1 s0 s1 = input Message m0 (b0 s0 s1).
intros; unfold Post_message in |- *; apply that_queue.
Lemma post_elsewhere : forall (b0 : Bag_of_message) (m0 : Message) (s0 s1 s2 s3 : Site), s0 <> s2 \/ s1 <> s3 -> Post_message m0 b0 s0 s1 s2 s3 = b0 s2 s3.
intros; unfold Post_message in |- *; apply other_queue; elim H; auto.
Lemma collect_here : forall (b0 : Bag_of_message) (s0 s1 : Site), Collect_message b0 s0 s1 s0 s1 = first_out Message (b0 s0 s1).
intros; unfold Collect_message in |- *; apply that_queue.
Lemma collect_elsewhere : forall (b0 : Bag_of_message) (s0 s1 s2 s3 : Site), s0 <> s2 \/ s1 <> s3 -> Collect_message b0 s0 s1 s2 s3 = b0 s2 s3.
intros; unfold Collect_message in |- *; apply other_queue; elim H; auto.
Lemma in_post : forall (m m' : Message) (bom : Bag_of_message) (s1 s2 s3 s4 : Site), m <> m' -> In_queue Message m (Post_message Message m' bom s1 s2 s3 s4) -> In_queue Message m (bom s3 s4).
intros m m' bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
intros; apply in_q_input with (d' := m'); trivial.
Lemma not_in_post : forall (m m' : Message) (bom : Bag_of_message) (s1 s2 s3 s4 : Site), m <> m' -> ~ In_queue Message m (bom s3 s4) -> ~ In_queue Message m (Post_message Message m' bom s1 s2 s3 s4).
intros m m' bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
Lemma not_in_collect : forall (m : Message) (bom : Bag_of_message) (s1 s2 s3 s4 : Site), ~ In_queue Message m (bom s3 s4) -> ~ In_queue Message m (Collect_message Message bom s1 s2 s3 s4).
intros m bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
Lemma in_collect : forall (m : Message) (bom : Bag_of_message) (s1 s2 s3 s4 : Site), In_queue Message m (Collect_message Message bom s1 s2 s3 s4) -> In_queue Message m (bom s3 s4).
intros m bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
rewrite collect_here; intros; apply in_q_output; trivial.
Lemma in_queue_decidable : forall (m : Message) (q : queue Message), {In_queue Message m q} + {~ In_queue Message m q}.
Lemma reduce_post_message : forall (m : Message) (s1 s2 : Site) (b : Bag_of_message), reduce Message f (Post_message Message m b s1 s2 s1 s2) = (reduce Message f (b s1 s2) + f m)%Z.

Lemma reduce_collect_message : forall (m : Message) (s1 s2 : Site) (b : Bag_of_message), first Message (b s1 s2) = value Message m -> reduce Message f (Collect_message Message b s1 s2 s1 s2) = (reduce Message f (b s1 s2) - f m)%Z.
intros m s1 s2 b H.
Lemma reduce_post_message_null : forall (m : Message) (s1 s2 s3 s4 : Site) (b : Bag_of_message), f m = 0%Z -> reduce Message f (Post_message Message m b s1 s2 s3 s4) = reduce Message f (b s3 s4).
intros m s1 s2 s3 s4 b H.

Lemma reduce_collect_message_null : forall (m : Message) (s1 s2 s3 s4 : Site) (b : Bag_of_message), first Message (b s1 s2) = value Message m -> f m = 0%Z -> reduce Message f (Collect_message Message b s1 s2 s3 s4) = reduce Message f (b s3 s4).
intros m s1 s2 s3 s4 b H H0.
Definition sigma_send_table (t : Send_T) := sigma_table Site LS Z (fun (s : Site) (x : Z) => x) t.
Definition Inc_send_table (t0 : Send_T) (s0 : Site) := update_table Site eq_site_dec Z t0 s0 (t0 s0 + 1)%Z.
Definition Dec_send_table (t0 : Send_T) (s0 : Site) := update_table Site eq_site_dec Z t0 s0 (t0 s0 - 1)%Z.
Definition Set_date_table (d0 : Date_T) (s0 : Site) (new_date : nat) := update_table Site eq_site_dec nat d0 s0 new_date.
Lemma sigma_inc_send_table : forall (t : Send_T) (s : Site), sigma_send_table (Inc_send_table t s) = (sigma_send_table t + 1)%Z.
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS Z t s (t s + 1)%Z (fun (s : Site) (x : Z) => x)).
Lemma sigma_dec_send_table : forall (t : Send_T) (s : Site), sigma_send_table (Dec_send_table t s) = (sigma_send_table t - 1)%Z.
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS Z t s (t s - 1)%Z (fun (s : Site) (x : Z) => x)).
Definition sigma_receive_table (t : Recv_T) := sigma_table Site LS bool (fun s : Site => Int) t.
Definition Set_rec_table (r0 : Recv_T) (s0 : Site) := change_site bool r0 s0 true.
Definition Reset_rec_table (r0 : Recv_T) (s0 : Site) := change_site bool r0 s0 false.
Lemma sigma_set_receive_table : forall (t : Recv_T) (s : Site), t s = false -> sigma_receive_table (Set_rec_table t s) = (sigma_receive_table t + 1)%Z.
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS bool t s true).
Lemma sigma_reset_receive_table : forall (t : Recv_T) (s : Site), t s = true -> sigma_receive_table (Reset_rec_table t s) = (sigma_receive_table t - 1)%Z.
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS bool t s false).
Definition sigma_table_but_owner (st : Table) := sigma_but Site owner eq_site_dec LS (fun s : Site => f s (st s)).
Lemma sigma_sigma_but_owner : forall t : Table, sigma_table Site LS Data f t = (sigma_table_but_owner t + f owner (t owner))%Z.

command: intros; unfold change_site in |- *; apply here.
intros; unfold change_site in |- *; apply elsewhere; trivial.
intros; unfold change_queue in |- *; unfold update2_table in |- *; apply here2.
intros; unfold change_queue in |- *; unfold update2_table in |- *; apply elsewhere2; trivial.
intros; apply only_once_in with (eq_E_dec := eq_site_dec); exact (finite_site s).
intros; unfold Post_message in |- *; apply that_queue.
intros; unfold Post_message in |- *; apply other_queue; elim H; auto.
intros; unfold Collect_message in |- *; apply that_queue.
intros; unfold Collect_message in |- *; apply other_queue; elim H; auto.
intros m m' bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
intros; apply in_q_input with (d' := m'); trivial.
intros m m' bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
intros m bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
intros m bom s1 s2 s3 s4; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite H; rewrite H0.
rewrite collect_here; intros; apply in_q_output; trivial.
intros m s1 s2 b H.
intros m s1 s2 s3 s4 b H.
intros m s1 s2 s3 s4 b H H0.
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS Z t s (t s + 1)%Z (fun (s : Site) (x : Z) => x)).
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS Z t s (t s - 1)%Z (fun (s : Site) (x : Z) => x)).
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS bool t s true).
rewrite (sigma_table_change Site eq_site_dec LS bool t s false).
